param.name: SQL
param.data:
CREATE TABLE ${@FORM[]tablename1[]}( Old_CATL_PN VARCHAR2(60), PART_NUMBER VARCHAR2(60) PRIMARY KEY, Description VARCHAR2(2000), Part_type VARCHAR2(200), Grade VARCHAR2(40), Category VARCHAR2(200), Value VARCHAR2(200), Tolerance VARCHAR2(200), Withstanding_Voltage VARCHAR2(200),
Schematic_Part VARCHAR2(200), Component_Footprint VARCHAR2(200), Assembly_Type VARCHAR2(200), Old_Footprint VARCHAR2(200), ALT_SYMBOLS VARCHAR2(200), EDADOC_Footprint VARCHAR2(200), IPC7351_Footprint_A_Maximum VARCHAR2(200), IPC7351_Footprint_B_Normal VARCHAR2(200), IPC7351_Footprint_C_Minimum VARCHAR2(200), Vibration_Footprint VARCHAR2(200),
Manufacturer1 VARCHAR2(200), MPN1 VARCHAR2(200), Datasheet1 VARCHAR2(200), Working_Temperature_Range VARCHAR2(200), Soldering_Temperature VARCHAR2(200), MSL_Level VARCHAR2(200), RoHS VARCHAR2(200), Pb_Free VARCHAR2(200), Halogen_Free VARCHAR2(200), Packaging VARCHAR2(200),
PPM VARCHAR2(200), Power VARCHAR2(200), Material VARCHAR2(200), Diameter VARCHAR2(200), Height VARCHAR2(200), Bobbin_Number VARCHAR2(200), Core_Type VARCHAR2(200), Junction_Temperature_Range VARCHAR2(200), RDS_on VARCHAR2(200), Insulation_Voltage VARCHAR2(200),
Connector_Color VARCHAR2(200), Frequency VARCHAR2(200), Functional_Classification VARCHAR2(200), Rated_Current VARCHAR2(200), Rated_Voltage VARCHAR2(200), catl_Current VARCHAR2(200), Measure_Range VARCHAR2(200), Driving_Voltage VARCHAR2(200), Pin_Quantity VARCHAR2(200), Pin_Spacing VARCHAR2(200),
Insulation_Resistance VARCHAR2(200), Pin_Film VARCHAR2(200), Flame_Retardancy VARCHAR2(200), Inbreaking_Protection_Grade VARCHAR2(200), Contact_Resistance VARCHAR2(200), Voltage VARCHAR2(200), Special_Explanation VARCHAR2(200), Applicant_Name VARCHAR2(200), Ver VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_NAME VARCHAR2(200), State VARCHAR2(200),
MATERIAL_SPECIFICATION VARCHAR2(2000), UNIT VARCHAR2(200), Manufacturer2 VARCHAR2(200), MPN2 VARCHAR2(200), Datasheet2 VARCHAR2(200), MPN3 VARCHAR2(200), Manufacturer3_PN VARCHAR2(200), Datasheet3 VARCHAR2(200), CATL_PN_2nd VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_NAME_2nd VARCHAR2(200),
MATERIAL_SPECIFICATION_2nd VARCHAR2(200), CATL_PN_3rd VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_NAME_3rd VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_SPECIFICATION_3rd VARCHAR2(200) )

param.name: SQL
param.data:
CREATE TABLE ${@FORM[]tablename2[]}( Old_CATL_PN VARCHAR2(60), PART_NUMBER VARCHAR2(60) PRIMARY KEY, Description VARCHAR2(2000), Part_type VARCHAR2(200), Grade VARCHAR2(40), Category VARCHAR2(200), Value VARCHAR2(200), Tolerance VARCHAR2(200), Withstanding_Voltage VARCHAR2(200),
Schematic_Part VARCHAR2(200), Component_Footprint VARCHAR2(200), Assembly_Type VARCHAR2(200), Old_Footprint VARCHAR2(200), ALT_SYMBOLS VARCHAR2(200), EDADOC_Footprint VARCHAR2(200), IPC7351_Footprint_A_Maximum VARCHAR2(200), IPC7351_Footprint_B_Normal VARCHAR2(200), IPC7351_Footprint_C_Minimum VARCHAR2(200), Vibration_Footprint VARCHAR2(200),
Manufacturer1 VARCHAR2(200), MPN1 VARCHAR2(200), Datasheet1 VARCHAR2(200), Working_Temperature_Range VARCHAR2(200), Soldering_Temperature VARCHAR2(200), MSL_Level VARCHAR2(200), RoHS VARCHAR2(200), Pb_Free VARCHAR2(200), Halogen_Free VARCHAR2(200), Packaging VARCHAR2(200),
PPM VARCHAR2(200), Power VARCHAR2(200), Material VARCHAR2(200), Diameter VARCHAR2(200), Height VARCHAR2(200), Bobbin_Number VARCHAR2(200), Core_Type VARCHAR2(200), Junction_Temperature_Range VARCHAR2(200), RDS_on VARCHAR2(200), Insulation_Voltage VARCHAR2(200),
Connector_Color VARCHAR2(200), Frequency VARCHAR2(200), Functional_Classification VARCHAR2(200), Rated_Current VARCHAR2(200), Rated_Voltage VARCHAR2(200), catl_Current VARCHAR2(200), Measure_Range VARCHAR2(200), Driving_Voltage VARCHAR2(200), Pin_Quantity VARCHAR2(200), Pin_Spacing VARCHAR2(200),
Insulation_Resistance VARCHAR2(200), Pin_Film VARCHAR2(200), Flame_Retardancy VARCHAR2(200), Inbreaking_Protection_Grade VARCHAR2(200), Contact_Resistance VARCHAR2(200), Voltage VARCHAR2(200), Special_Explanation VARCHAR2(200), Applicant_Name VARCHAR2(200), Ver VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_NAME VARCHAR2(200), State VARCHAR2(200),
MATERIAL_SPECIFICATION VARCHAR2(2000), UNIT VARCHAR2(200), Manufacturer2 VARCHAR2(200), MPN2 VARCHAR2(200), Datasheet2 VARCHAR2(200), MPN3 VARCHAR2(200), Manufacturer3_PN VARCHAR2(200), Datasheet3 VARCHAR2(200), CATL_PN_2nd VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_NAME_2nd VARCHAR2(200),
MATERIAL_SPECIFICATION_2nd VARCHAR2(200), CATL_PN_3rd VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_NAME_3rd VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_SPECIFICATION_3rd VARCHAR2(200) )

param.name: SQL
param.data: CREATE TABLE ${@FORM[]tablename3[]}( Old_CATL_PN VARCHAR2(60), PART_NUMBER VARCHAR2(60) PRIMARY KEY, Description VARCHAR2(2000), Part_type VARCHAR2(200), Value VARCHAR2(200), Schematic_Part VARCHAR2(200), Old_Footprint VARCHAR2(200), Applicant_Name VARCHAR2(200), Ver VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_NAME VARCHAR2(200), State VARCHAR2(200), MATERIAL_SPECIFICATION VARCHAR2(2000), UNIT VARCHAR2(200) )

param.name: SQL
param.data: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW ${@FORM[]viewname1[]} AS SELECT * FROM ${@FORM[]tablename1[]}
